Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier track conditions at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier track conditions at Western.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Division
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses rrted SB: Clark, Maple, and State; NB: State, Chicago, Dearborn, Walton, and Clark due to, street blockage near State/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/Division.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Maple, and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Chicago, Dearborn, Walton, and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.
